text: The 2006 Chief Financial Officer General election took place on November 7, 2006, to elect the Chief Financial Officer of Florida. The election was won by Alex Sink who took office on January 2, 2007. As of , this is the most recent time a Democrat was elected Chief Financial Officer. ==Republican primary== *Tom Lee, State Senator *Randy Johnson *Milt Bauguess ===Results=== ==Democratic primary== *Alex Sink, Wife of Bill McBride and Former Bank of America President ===Results=== ==Results== ==External links== *Florida Department of State, November 7, 2006 General Election Category:2006 Florida elections
title: 2006 Florida Chief Financial Officer election
